name: launchchimp
description: A Launchrock Mailchimp API Integration Daemon

LAUNCHCHIMP_LR_EMAIL.description: Email address to login to Launchrock

LAUNCHCHIMP_LR_PASSWORD.description: Password used to login to Launchrock

LAUNCHCHIMP_LR_PROJECT.description: Name of the project in Launchrock

LAUNCHCHIMP_MC_ADMINS.description: Comma separated list of emails to send a success email to

LAUNCHCHIMP_MC_LIST.description: Name of the Mailchimp list to add subscribers to

LAUNCHCHIMP_POLL_FREQUENCY.description: How frequently to poll for new users
